Components.Specifications.Presentation

Interface IPresentationComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CPresentationComp

    public interface IPresentationComp
extends IPAMOJAComponent
    Interface providing services for collaborating with other components.
